alert.note: Alert for Marion; Schley; Taylor; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 6:01AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marion, northwestern Webster, Schley and southwestern Taylor Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 601 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Zellobee, or 7 miles west of Buena Vista, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Buena Vista, Ellaville, Putnam, Brantley, Murrays Crossroads, Rupert, La Crosse, Charing, Oakland, Draneville, Zellobee, Tazewell, Marion Estates, Doyle and Walls Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
